name: SferePhall
description:
Delay the Sfere's inevitable Phall into the abyss as long as possible!

With explosives, anti-gravity fields, damping zones, barriers, and the ability to slow time at your disposal, you can drag'n'drop a range of obstacles that will slow things down.

However, there's no way to get the ball stuck... or is there? You'll have to play to find out!

Engine: Godot 3.4.4
Textures: photographed using Nokia 6.1, edited in GIMP
Music: composed in MuseScore 3 with its default sound font
Sound effects: recorded with Nokia 6.1 (things around the house + playing trumpet), edited in Audacity
Menu font: Patrick Hand by Patrick Wagesreiter via Google Fonts
3D models: Blender & Godot CSG

Project source code: https://github.com/AlnisS/sferephall
